item.ring_of_miner.ring_of_miner.line1: Breaks most vanilla blocks around the player
item.ring_of_miner.ring_of_miner.line2: Right-click to break blocks, no drops
item.ring_of_miner.ring_of_miner.line3: Shift +  right-click to break blocks, with drops
item.ring_of_miner.ring_of_miner.line5: Right-click to break blocks, with drops
item.ring_of_miner.ring_of_miner.line6: Shift +  right-click to break blocks, no drops
